body.subject: Epic 28 deployment cancelled - project conservation
body.summary: Project conservation initiated. All shared infrastructure containers stopped (MongoDB, Prometheus, Grafana, Postgres, Redis, Kafka, exporters). Deployment status changed to CANCELLED. Stage 1 (staging) deployment was in progress but halted. All containers safely stopped, no data loss. Deployment can be resumed when project is reactivated.

body.action_needed: Deployment cancelled due to project conservation. All containers stopped. When project is reactivated, restart shared infrastructure and resume deployment from Stage 1 (staging). All deployment artifacts (deployment.json, runbooks, monitoring configs) remain available for future use.
